content: pattern was featured on knit & crochet today episode listing 1 show 201 hats off a free pdf copy of the pattern is available by clicking here 2 when logged into website registration and login required to see download link search for pattern by name if links fail 1 http //knitandcrochetnow com/fly aspx layout=episodesindex&taxid=108 2 http //knitandcrochetnow com/downloadfly aspx download=productimages/crochetbrimhat_pattern pdf
